item.title: 启用一个新blog（Hugo试用）
item.description: Hugo试用 基本流程走通：post – publish basic configs basic markdown config the markup(code pieces) insert an image by ref as in static or by a shortcode organizations (page resources/bundles, ) Shortcode A shortcode is a simple snippet inside a content file that Hugo will render using a predefined template. Note that shortcodes will not work in template files. DeviantArt Test for markdown a1 a2xxx
